data_description.api_key: The Slack API token to use for sending Slack messages.
data_description.default_channel: The channel to post to if no channel is specified when sending a message.
data_description.icon: Use one of the Slack emojis as an icon for the supplied username.
data_description.username: Home Assistant will post to Slack using the username specified.

user.description: Refer to the documentation on getting your Slack API key.
